page.title: 07ROADS & GAMES IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: The debate about the local {by-pass} has gone on for years.A choice is to be made soon from three possible routes. One would pass through the {trading estate},whilst two would pass through {strawberry fields}.Many fear that the choice will not be the local one. {Kids'games} will {change}-"We all pinched old Bert's apples, it wasn't the apples we were after.It was the chasing".Or - "Matches in one hand,sticks in the other, we moved slowly towards the wood" or -"Lets go {scrumping},you go in the back and I'll keep lookout"."Off you go before I phone the police"."We were {cherry-knocking}.Me and my mate.We ran away,got round the corner and started making faces at his door".Or - "We trespassed on a farmer's land.He saw us and came after us with a club".
